Flow.description:
Flow to test the old Aura version of the component. Use the "Dynamic Flow Progress LWC - Sampler" flow to test the new LWC version.
09/20/2022 - Updated Flow Label to "zDynamic Flow Progress Aura - Sample (Old)" to minimize confusion with the new flow that tests the new LWC version of the component.
Flow.label: zDynamic Flow Progress Aura - Sample (Old)
